title: How to get Android 12L’s taskbar on Pixel 6 and other Google smartphones
content:
Android 12L is by no means a major update, but it does deliver one big new feature in its app taskbar. Here’s how to try the Android 12L taskbar on Google Pixel devices including the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro.

more…

The post How to get Android 12L’s taskbar on Pixel 6 and other Google smartphones appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: You can try out the tablet-focused taskbar in Android 12L on Google Pixel smartphones; here's how to do it, and how to go back, too.
